about_the_game:
This downloadable content for White Noise 2 allows you to play with 2 new investigators, and get 2 new Flashlights:

Corey


Threatened to end up in a correction home, Corey didn't hesitate for a second and ran away.

His straightforwardness has brought him astray, but it's also helped him survive until today.

Corey is a jack-of-all-trades investigator capable of helping the team with his mechanic skills. Sadly he has a tendency to break things...

Shaira


When not absorbed in spiritism books or ancient rites, Shaira is a renowned fortune teller.

Will her extensive knowledge about paranormal events help her facing the darkest horrors?

Shaira can use her spiritism skills to empower nearby ghosts. Her concentration can be easily broken, so she works better with her flashlight off.

LED Spotlight


It offers noticeable battery savings, but it's not exactly built with quality materials...

Railroad Lantern


The main communication method between trains and stations has become a reference point in the fight against evil.
detailed_description:
This downloadable content for White Noise 2 allows you to play with 2 new investigators, and get 2 new Flashlights:

Corey


Threatened to end up in a correction home, Corey didn't hesitate for a second and ran away.

His straightforwardness has brought him astray, but it's also helped him survive until today.

Corey is a jack-of-all-trades investigator capable of helping the team with his mechanic skills. Sadly he has a tendency to break things...

Shaira


When not absorbed in spiritism books or ancient rites, Shaira is a renowned fortune teller.

Will her extensive knowledge about paranormal events help her facing the darkest horrors?

Shaira can use her spiritism skills to empower nearby ghosts. Her concentration can be easily broken, so she works better with her flashlight off.

LED Spotlight


It offers noticeable battery savings, but it's not exactly built with quality materials...

Railroad Lantern


The main communication method between trains and stations has become a reference point in the fight against evil.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.10 or newer
  • Processor: Dual Core processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2 Graphics card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: For AMD Graphic cards, MESA drivers newer than 10.1.5 are recommended.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.10 or newer
  • Processor: Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 660 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+, tested on OSX 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.5GHz dual-core Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2 Graphics card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+, tested on OSX 10.10+
  • Processor: Quad core processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: White Noise 2 - Corey & Shaira

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP3
  • Processor: Dual Core processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 capable hardware
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64bit OS recommended but not required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Quad core processor
  • Graphics: GeForce 660 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: This downloadable content for White Noise 2 allows you to play with 2 new investigators, and get 2 new Flashlights.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Italian, Finnish, Russian, French, German, Portuguese - Portugal, Norwegian, Hungarian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
